name: Angry Tap Fish Free - Cool Game
name_original: Angry Tap Fish Free - Cool Game
description:
“Catching fish used to be an easy thing.” Said a fisherman.

That was the old time. And now, sharks are coming. They bite people. Only the best are able to catch some fish. Fishman have trouble now. Will you come and help they to catch some fish? They will be very grateful. But be careful.

Highlights:
• Challenging gameplay
• Easy to learn but hard to master
• Cute cartoon graphics
• Game Center support
• Online leaderboard
